Functions

00200_TrustletDriverCommunication
[Performance]

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00101_Trustlet_Ping_SAMPLE_API ()
 TestCase_GC00301_Trustlet_Driver_Ping_SAMPLE_API ()
 TestCase_GC00201_Driver_Ping_SAMPLE_API ()

 TestCase_GC00400_mcMapAndDriverPing2x4k ()
 TestCase_GC00400_mcMapAndDriverPing3x4k ()
 TestCase_GC00400_mcMapAndDriverPing4x4k ()

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. DrIntegrationTest Driver
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection
  4. Trusted Application TlTestIntegrationTest
    1. Trusted Application copied to Android on Test device in registry as 05010000000000000000000000000000.trst
    2. Trusted Application runnable and bug-free

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00101_Trustlet_Ping_SAMPLE_API (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000 02040000000000000000000000000000
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
Repeated Trusted Application-Calls
Test Steps:
Repeated Trusted Application-Calls from Connector for time measuring Trusted Application just answers with accept message, no error message
Verification:
mcWaitNotification() returns MC_DRV_OK.
returnCode == RET_OK No additional error code is set.
Test output is OK.
